message.body: Crystal! It's Sofie - hannibals girl! Bob just told me that you were on ricki lake!!! I want to see that! That's awesome!
I wouldnt go on show, just there when they came to film doc in streets, i wouldnt sign waver so it my blured face. It came to mind couple times recently
and her show coming back, i hav bad feeling it gona be rerunned as show restarts
Oh they are pretty good about thAt stuff... They won't want to do reruns. Bob is laughing! He says they won't show it... Too old. How are you doing? How's your kid?
sean said b4 he cant find it, when reminded recently i looked it up, a tv guide site gave discription wit link but i couldnt pull it up, then saw advert
ise she restarting. I feel like It getting talked up man, mtv chick was on it, i think it gona pop up. Nika good thanks, is bob in philly. I want c yal
I'm in boston, bobs in north Carolina! We are video chatting cuz we r hi tech!!!!! Bob says he loves ya and his phone is on so you should call him. Don't sweat the lake lady.
By the way If u ever want to come to boston you and Nika got a place to stay ( my place is big)
Im not really sweating it, if it shows id be like omg and laughing same time. Is she a whore??, thought she a nice girl
Wow, thanks, i never been to boston, didnt know u left new york. I been laying low, gota reevoluate job and shit got real wit fam, but working it out the
n gota plan some shit. I always wanted to c boston, especially when a friend at destination so more fun

Yeah come!! my life is pretty boring now, fun but not exciting. I'm a student again I read and write and sit on my ass and think a lot. Ricki lake seems like a pretty kinky lady, but what do I know? She's fat then thin, then skinny fat. She's white star jones.
